## generated by : /home/cactus/cactus_env/bin/cactus-prepare evolverMammals.txt --outDir evolverMammals-out/ --outHal evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal --gpu
## date : 2024-12-03 15:44:12.299778
## cactus commit : 20488aeb80c3ef985034e538b36ad97ed632cad2


## Preprocessor
cactus-preprocess ./jobstore/0 evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt --inputNames simHuman_chr6 simCow_chr6 simDog_chr6 simMouse_chr6 simRat_chr6   --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/preprocess-simHuman_chr6.log

## Alignment

### Round 0
cactus-blast ./jobstore/1 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc2.paf --root Anc2   --gpu all --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/blast-Anc2.log
cactus-align ./jobstore/2 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc2.paf evolverMammals-out/Anc2.hal --root Anc2   --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/align-Anc2.log
hal2fasta evolverMammals-out/Anc2.hal Anc2 --hdf5InMemory > evolverMammals-out/Anc2.fa

cactus-blast ./jobstore/3 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/mr.paf --root mr   --gpu all --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/blast-mr.log
cactus-align ./jobstore/4 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/mr.paf evolverMammals-out/mr.hal --root mr   --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/align-mr.log
hal2fasta evolverMammals-out/mr.hal mr --hdf5InMemory > evolverMammals-out/mr.fa

### Round 1
cactus-blast ./jobstore/5 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc1.paf --root Anc1   --gpu all --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/blast-Anc1.log
cactus-align ./jobstore/6 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc1.paf evolverMammals-out/Anc1.hal --root Anc1   --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/align-Anc1.log
hal2fasta evolverMammals-out/Anc1.hal Anc1 --hdf5InMemory > evolverMammals-out/Anc1.fa

### Round 2
cactus-blast ./jobstore/7 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc0.paf --root Anc0   --gpu all --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/blast-Anc0.log
cactus-align ./jobstore/8 evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.txt evolverMammals-out/Anc0.paf evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal --root Anc0   --logFile evolverMammals-out/logs/align-Anc0.log
hal2fasta evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal Anc0 --hdf5InMemory > evolverMammals-out/Anc0.fa

## HAL merging
halAppendSubtree evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal evolverMammals-out/Anc1.hal Anc1 Anc1 --merge --hdf5InMemory
halAppendSubtree evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal evolverMammals-out/Anc2.hal Anc2 Anc2 --merge --hdf5InMemory
halAppendSubtree evolverMammals-out/evolverMammals.hal evolverMammals-out/mr.hal mr mr --merge --hdf5InMemory
